Usage notes: A quote from the teacher him/herself.

Form 2: ++Quote:++ {prefix} “{text}”{' — ' if suffix else ''}{suffix}||{'.' if suffix else ''} Quoted by {teacher}.
Usage notes: The teacher quoting someone else. If the person quoted in a teacher, they should get the first tag.

{teacher} should be the author of the book. Use a Read by annotation to indicate who does the reading. If the book appears in the list of references, {teacher} will be set and " by {teacher}" inserted automatically. If not, plug both in manually along with the hyperlink if relevant.
If the reader is not a teacher, {teacher} should be Anon and {text} specifies the name of the reader.
